traits.name: Endless Endurance
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self. On every {1;0} {Retaliates}: Additionally cleanses {1;1} {Corruption} from self.'

traits.name: Mesmerize
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {Redirect} to self.'

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Protector
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Redirect}, allies gain +{0;0} {Defense} and +{1;0} {Shielding}.

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Return To Aether
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Generates {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Safeguard
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than {0} {Shield}: {Shields} self equal to the difference.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: 'At the start of combat: Applies {0;1} {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: True Grit
traits.description: 'Whenever {Redirect} is applied to this monster: {Shields} self for {1}.'

traits.name: Accelerated Generation
traits.description: '{On Action}, if it was this monster’s second {Action} of the same turn: Generates {Wild Aether}.'

traits.name: Aether Breath
traits.description: 'For every {0} Aether consumed by allies: Applies {1} {Power} to this monster and triggers an {Attack} against all enemies for [3] x [2] {Wild damage}.'

traits.name: Aether Cycle
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Aether] consumed by allies: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Aether Shield
traits.description: 'Whenever this monster generates or consumes [Aether]: {Shields} self equal to the amount of generated or consumed [Aether].'

traits.name: Cosmic Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Generates {Wild} Aether.'

traits.name: Cosmic Fire
traits.description: Every [3rd] {Fire} [Aether] generated by your allies is converted into {Wild} [Aether]. {Wild} [Aether] also counts as {Fire} [Aether] for the effects of your skills.

traits.name: Split Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Wild} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Wild Damage} [Hit] and {purge} {1;1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Synchronous Aging
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach [5] [Aether] of the same element: Applies {Age} and {Shields} all allies with {Age} for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Synchronous Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Heals all allies for {2} x {1}.'

traits.name: Synchronous Majesty
traits.description: 'When you reach {0} [Aether] of the same element: {Purges} [1] enemy [Aether] of the same element and applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Synchronous Surge
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Applies {Weakness} and deals {1;3} damage of that element to each enemy.'

traits.name: Void Burn
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Generates {Wild}/{Wild} [Aether]. At the end of your turn: Consumes all {Wild} [Aether] and deals a {1} damage [Hit] to this Monster for each.'

traits.name: Void Infusion
traits.description: Whenever {Wild Aether} is spent on an ally's {Action}, its second [Hit] does {Wild Damage}. If it's a {Support Action}, it applies {0} {Terror} to each enemy instead.

traits.name: Age Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Applies {Age} to all allies with {Age}.'

traits.name: Age of Fire
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Burn} stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Ancient Power
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {1} {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Cosmic Wisdom
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Decay
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Triggers an {Attack} against all enemies with [2] {Earth}/{Water} [Hits]; damage of each [Hit] equals the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Eldritch Horror
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Terror} stacks to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Terror} equal to the total amount of {Age} on all allies.'

traits.name: Experienced Strikes
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Sidekick} to self. {Sidekick} on this monster deals additional damage equal to the amount of {Age} stacks on it.'

traits.name: Golden Age
traits.description: 'For every {0} Age on an ally: Cleanses {1;1} debuffs from them and applies {Age} to them.'

traits.name: Outlast
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. Whenever Age is applied to this monster: Heals and {Shields} self for {1}.'

types.name: TypeAether
types.description: This Type focuses on generating Aether and also provides you with strong options to utilize excess Aether.

types.name: TypeAge
types.description: This Type focuses on Age stacks, which provide a variety of different effects that become more powerful the longer the fight goes on.
